metadata.description: Complete plugin ecosystem for Onecount Shopify apps - 15 interconnected apps with orchestrator pattern, Linear integration, and automated progress tracking

plugins.name: onecount-core
plugins.description: Core orchestrator plugin with project briefer, Linear integration, progress tracking, and ecosystem-wide agents. Install this first.

plugins.name: onecount-shopify-validator
plugins.description: Auto-validates GraphQL, Polaris components, and Liquid templates using Shopify MCP tools

plugins.name: onecount-wishlist
plugins.description: Onecount Wishlist app (App 1) - Multiple lists, conversion analytics, sharing. Phase 1 Foundation.

plugins.name: onecount-notify
plugins.description: Onecount Notify app (App 2) - BYOAPI email/SMS/push notifications. Phase 1 Foundation.

plugins.name: onecount-reviews
plugins.description: Onecount Reviews app (App 3) - Photo/video reviews, Q&A. Phase 2 Trust.

plugins.name: onecount-loyalty
plugins.description: Onecount Loyalty app (App 4) - Points, tiers, referrals. Phase 2 Retention.

plugins.name: onecount-promos
plugins.description: Onecount Promos app (App 5) - Shopify Functions discounts, BOGO, flash sales. Phase 3 Revenue.

plugins.name: onecount-upsell
plugins.description: Onecount Upsell app (App 6) - Smart recommendations, cart upsells. Phase 3 Revenue.

plugins.name: onecount-bundles
plugins.description: Onecount Bundles app (App 7) - Fixed & build-your-own bundles. Phase 3 Revenue.

plugins.name: onecount-customizer
plugins.description: Onecount Customizer app (App 8) - Product options simple & advanced. Phase 3 Revenue.

plugins.name: onecount-gifts
plugins.description: Onecount Gifts app (App 9) - Gift cards, store credit. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-seo
plugins.description: Onecount SEO app (App 10) - On-page SEO toolkit. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-inventory
plugins.description: Onecount Inventory app (App 11) - Stock tracking, audit trail. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-b2b
plugins.description: Onecount B2B app (App 12) - Wholesale pricing, company accounts. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-forms
plugins.description: Onecount Forms app (App 13) - Contact, quote, survey forms. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-verify
plugins.description: Onecount Verify app (App 14) - Age verification, compliance. Phase 4 Complete.

plugins.name: onecount-analytics
plugins.description: Onecount Analytics app (App 15) - Unified customer intelligence. Phase 4+ Complete.
